meanings.definition: A member of a group or organization who shares membership with others.
meanings.sent1: In our club, we are all comembers who work together on projects.
meanings.sent2: The comembers of the team meet every week to discuss their progress.
meanings.sent3: The comembers decided to have a fun picnic to celebrate their successful project.
meanings.sent4: As comembers of the same organization, they were like a big family.
meanings.sent5: Being comembers means we support each other through thick and thin.

meanings.definition: Members who belong to the same group or organization.
meanings.sent1: All comembers of the association have equal voting rights.
meanings.sent2: The comembers of the committee have different roles to fulfill.
meanings.sent3: The comembers shared a laugh over a funny incident during their meeting.
meanings.sent4: The comembers stood united in their decision to support the community.
meanings.sent5: The bond between comembers is strong and unbreakable.
